forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly sunny. High near 33, with temperatures falling to around 31 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 1am. Partly cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. West northwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Veterans Day
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 10pm, then a chance of freezing rain between 10pm and 11pm, then a chance of snow between 11pm and 4am, then a slight chance of rain and snow. Cloudy, with a low around 30. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew had a chance to test the system today with a nice shot of cold air.
